title: Ep. 564: Frankly Speaking | Earnings Bonanza
itunes:title: Frankly Speaking | Earnings Bonanza
description: In this and every episode of Frankly Speaking, we discuss your top questions about the markets, stocks, the economy – even sports.    This week (10/27/2017): Earnings bonanza… Why growth is more important than value right now… My favorite lessons since starting my own business… And Eagles to the Super Bowl? Questions & Comments:  “Thanks for the Curzio Research Advisory exclusive update!” - Derek [00:46]  “How about em’ Eagles?” - James [06:59]  “All major tech companies are reporting blow-out earnings. With these stocks at incredibly expensive levels, should be we start looking to short? ...Or will these names continue to move higher (seemingly) forever?” - Brett [09:07]  “I’m an entrepreneur like yourself. I just started a new business venture and I wanted to get any wisdom you’re willing to offer on how to grow my business and generate sales...” - Todd [17:55]
